title: Hybrid Fusion
description: Explore methods that combine both feature-level and decision-level fusion.

examples.description: Utilizes a fusion-separation mechanism to combine EEG and ECG modalities, allowing independent utilization of features from both for enhanced accuracy.
examples.note: Added for its use of a fusion-separation mechanism to effectively combine EEG and ECG modalities, demonstrating a hybrid fusion approach.

examples.description: Employs a feature fusion module (FFM) that integrates spatial and temporal features using channel attention mechanisms.
examples.note: Added for its employment of a feature fusion module that integrates spatial and temporal features, illustrating a hybrid fusion approach.

trend: Maximizing the benefits of both early and late fusion strategies.
